definition: lit. in the eyes of a lover appears 西施[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder
pinyin: qing2 ren2 yan3 li3 chu1 Xi1 shi1

definition: feeling/emotion/passion/situation
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Li (surname)
lining/interior/inside/internal/also written 裏|里[li3]
variant of 裡|里[li3]

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
surname Shi
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: It's called love is blind, I think.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是情人眼里出西施吧。

sentences.english: But, as far as embryos go, beauty is often in the eye of the beholder, Holte says.
sentences.chinese: 但是，胚胎的选择和评估，也是情人眼里出西施。

sentences.english: But is in the eyes of the beholder, exactly.
sentences.chinese: 但是情人眼里出西施，一点都不错。

sentences.english: Beauty is in the Eye of the Beholder-Women in Chinese Painting.
sentences.chinese: 中国画里多是情人眼里出西施。

definition: ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
women love bad guys
pinyin: nan2 ren2 bu4 huai4 , nu:3 ren2 bu4 ai4

definition: nobody is perfect/everyone has their defect
narcissism
lit. a bunch of flowers poked into a pile of manure/fig. a terrible shame (as when a lovely woman marries an odious man)
pinyin: xian1 hua1 cha1 zai4 niu2 fen4 shang4

definition: (coll.) womanizer/skirt-chaser
familiarity breeds fondness (idiom)
the "good-looks club": people who attach great importance to a person's appearance (pun on 外貿協會|外贸协会 foreign trade association)
femme fatale
fickle (in love affairs)/dissipated/unfaithful/heart of a flower (pistil and stamen)
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
related.word: 不是一家人不进一家门

definition: everyone has their likes and dislikes (idiom)
lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
even heroes have a weakness for the charms of a beautiful woman (idiom)
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 nan2 guo4 mei3 ren2 guan1

definition: love at first sight (idiom)
lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected/Love me, love my dog.
